mapper.select:
/* retrievePurRqList 리스트 조회 */ select a.S_CODE as sCode ,a.SAMPLE as sample ,a.M_CODE as mCode ,a.KNTTP as knttp ,a.USED_CODE as usedCode ,a.PSTYP as pstyp ,a.IZWEK as izwek ,a.BIZ_CD as bizCd ,a.SAKTO as sakto ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T x WHERE x.CODE = RTRIM(a.EKGRP) AND x.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND x.GROUP_CODE = '01' AND x.REGION_CD = a.region_cd ) as ekgrpnm ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T y WHERE y.CODE = RTRIM(a.SAKTO) AND y.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND y.GROUP_CODE = '10' AND y.REGION_CD = a.region_cd ) as saktonm ,a.EKGRP as ekgrp ,a.WERKS as werks ,a.ANLKL as anlkl ,a.SEQ_NUM as sCodeSeq ,a.IS_MRO as isMro from [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a where a.REGION_CD ='01' and a.BIZ_CD = '01' /* 추후 02, 03 등록 가능성 있음 */ and a.USE_YN = 'Y'
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.PSTYP = '' and a.USED_CODE ='S' and a.IZWEK != '01'
and a.KNTTP = 'A' and a.PSTYP = ''
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.M_CODE ='투자'
and a.KNTTP = 'P' and a.PSTYP = '' and a.USED_CODE = 'O'
and a.S_CODE = #{sCode}
order by a.L_CODE, a.M_CODE, a.S_CODE asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PR_PRSREQ_T ( BANFN_PRS , BNFPO_PRS , SEQ_NUM , S_CODE , KNTTP , PSTYP , TXZ01 , MENGE , MEINS , EEIND , AFNAM , MATKL , WERKS , EKGRP , BEDNR , PREIS , WAERS , PEINH , SAKTO , POSID , POST1 , PRS_FLAG , IZWEK , ITEM_TXT , MAKER , VENDOR , CATALOGNO , POSITION , USED_CODE , BIZ_CD , ATTC_FIL_ID , BADATE ) values ( #{banfnPrs} , ISNULL(#{bnfpoPrs}, 0) , (next value for [dbo].[PR_PRSREQ_Q02]) , ISNULL(#{sCodeNm},'') , ISNULL((SELECT KNTTP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL((SELECT PSTYP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL(#{itemnm},'') , CONVERT(NUMERIC(13,0), ISNULL(#{menge},'0')) , ISNULL(#{meins},'') , REPLACE(#{eeind},'-','') , ISNULL(#{afnam},'') , ISNULL((SELECT MATKL FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL(#{werks},'') , ISNULL(#{ekgrp},'') , ISNULL(#{bednr},'') , CONVERT(NUMERIC(12,2), ISNULL(#{preis},'0')) , 'KRW' , CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,0), ISNULL(#{peinh},'1')) , ISNULL((SELECT SAKTO FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL(#{wbsCd},'') , ISNULL(#{wbsCdNm},'') , ISNULL(#{prsFlag},'0') , ISNULL((SELECT IZWEK FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL(#{itemTxt},'') , ISNULL(#{maker},'') , ISNULL(#{vendor},'') , ISNULL(#{catalogno},'') , ISNULL(#{position},'') , ISNULL((SELECT USED_CODE FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL((SELECT BIZ_CD FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ISNULL(#{attcFilId},'') , getdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PR_PRSREQ_T SET S_CODE = ISNULL(#{sCodeNm},'') , KNTTP = ISNULL((SELECT KNTTP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , PSTYP = ISNULL((SELECT PSTYP FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , TXZ01 = ISNULL(#{txz01},'') , MENGE = CONVERT(NUMERIC(13,0), ISNULL(#{menge},'0')) , MEINS = ISNULL(#{meins},'') , EEIND = REPLACE(#{eeind},'-','') , MATKL = ISNULL((SELECT MATKL FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , WERKS = ISNULL(#{werks},'') , EKGRP = ISNULL(#{ekgrp},'') , PREIS = CONVERT(NUMERIC(12,2), ISNULL(#{preis},'0')) , PEINH = CONVERT(NUMERIC(5,0), ISNULL(#{peinh},'1')) , SAKTO = ISNULL((SELECT SAKTO FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , POSID = ISNULL(#{posid},'') , IZWEK = ISNULL((SELECT IZWEK FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , ITEM_TXT = ISNULL(#{itemTxt},'') , MAKER = ISNULL(#{maker},'') , VENDOR = ISNULL(#{vendor},'') , CATALOGNO = ISNULL(#{catalogno},'') , POSITION = ISNULL(#{position},'') , USED_CODE = ISNULL((SELECT USED_CODE FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') , BIZ_CD = ISNULL((SELECT BIZ_CD FROM [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a WHERE a.seq_num = #{sCode}),'') WHERE BANFN_PRS = #{banfnPrs} AND BNFPO_PRS = #{bnfpoPrs} AND AFNAM = #{_userNm} AND BEDNR = #{_userSabun}
mapper.select: /* banfn_prs 번호채번 */ select next value for PR_PRSREQ_Q01;
/* seq_num 번호채번 */ select next value for PR_PRSREQ_Q02;
mapper.insert: /* 구매요청 결재의뢰 저장 */ INSERT INTO PR_APPROVAL_T ( BANFN_PRS , APR1_PERNR , APR1_ENAME , APR2_PERNR , APR2_ENAME , APR3_PERNR , APR3_ENAME , APR4_PERNR , APR4_ENAME , G_CHECK , G_CHECK2 , OPIN_DOC , WBS_PERNR ) values ( ISNULL(#{banfnPrs} , '') , ISNULL(#{apr1Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr1Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr2Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr2Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr3Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr3Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr4Pernr}, '') , ISNULL(#{apr4Ename}, '') , ISNULL(#{gCheck} , 'N') , ISNULL(#{gCheck2} , 'N') , ISNULL(#{opinDoc} , '') , ISNULL(#{wbsPernr} , '') )
